Package it.unipi.hadoop

Class Centroid

java.lang.Object
it.unipi.hadoop.Centroid
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<Centroid>, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable, org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<Centroid>
public class Centroid extends Object implements org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable<Centroid>
Represents a centroid in the KMeans algorithm. Each centroid is associated with a centroid ID and a Point object representing its coordinates.
